akn:section.akn:heading: Use of private sector resources in surveying and mapping

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 569e. Use of private sector resources in surveying and mapping To the maximum extent practicable, the Secretary shall make use of private sector resources in carrying out surveying and mapping activities in the Civil Works Program of the Corps of Engineers. (Pub. L. 102–580, title II, § 212, Oct. 31, 1992, 106 Stat. 4831.)
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries
“Secretary” Defined Secretary means the Secretary of the Army, see section 3 of Pub. L. 102–580, set out as a note under section 2201 of this title.
